description: Buy, sell, and browse millions of items with a flick of your finger. The eBay app for Windows 8 brings the power of the world’s largest online marketplace directly to your Start Screen. Reimagined for a touch-first world, the app replaces cluttered lists with a beautiful, high-resolution grid of products. Whether you are hunting for a rare collectible or selling your old gadgets, the eBay app makes the process faster and more visual than ever before.
